column4: Dude i'm serious, they didn't make avast 5 on Linux. And avast 4 is old stuff, altough some country sites still have Avast 4. Whatever though
Who's "ldconfig" anyway? After you've finished installing something with apt-get it always sezzit "ldconfig dereffered process is now taking place..."
Oh. Thanks G_A_C, manpage made totally no sense :/
Avast for Linux does exist still...
